successfulSentence: Nicely done! Looks like the spirits were pleased with your work and a path opened up up ahead!
failedSentence: I suggest you give that painting some more love. Bring it back once you're done.
waitingSentence: Place your canvas in the spot I marked, and once you're done painting, bring it back to me.

sentences: You have your easel with you, right?
Awesome, why don't you set up here and paint that rock and that nice ol' tree over there.
See that glow? Get near it and press E to place your easel and start painting.
The wooden thing you support paintings on. You really need to study your vocab.
